title: Alright I'm done with veigar
body:
Nice mage update Riot, I've had a veigar in 90% of my games and all he's done is gone 18/3 and one shotted everyone with his ult. Not even qss can save you from that little fuck. 

Can't dodge a targeted ability
http://imgur.com/EF67AiI 


I.E FIX THAT PASSIVE

replies.body: His ultimate is harder to one shot with now tho lol wtf are you on about

I was pretty sure Veiger's ult is single target. xD

You must be talking about his dark matter to which you guys must've been really poorly positioned for it to "One shot" all of you.
No his ult, I didn't mean he actually hit all of us with his ult at the SAME time lol
That's not how it works xD
Veigars ult? It's a single targeted ability what part of that doesn't work?
Ah never mind I've been misinterpreting the whole time.
I think they did a good thing with his ult. More effictive agaist tanks late game on lower health and he cant just go use it straight up on an adc like he used to.
Lol, from what I saw, that Veigar went 18/14/13, not 18/3. 14 deaths is quite enough for you and your team to push an advantage, as long as you didn't die too much either ;)
I was exaggerating, basically every veigar has been fed in my games
Huh, I've been maining mid lately and never once vs'ed a Veigar.
He sat in the gamers chair and said " fuck my games up fam"
